After the welcome and meeting Nemesis, Delta turned his head back to Zardus 
and he gave his first orders.  He was going to extend his hand out to 
Nemesis for a hand shake "nice to meet you, Nemesis" but by the time he turn 
his he was gone, leaving him sitting there with his hand out. ".....(put's 
his arm down) well, now if only i knew how, or where the bridge is!"

/_\Delta/_\
